abstract: Italian Parliament passes decrees ordering government to toughen penalties for olive oil fraud.
lead_paragraph: The Italian Parliament passed decrees ordering the government to strengthen penalties beyond fines in an effort to bolster the “made in Italy” brand.

headline.main: Italy Moves to Toughen Penalties for Olive Oil Fraud
headline.print_headline: Italy Moving to Strengthen Olive Oil Laws

snippet: The Italian Parliament passed decrees ordering the government to strengthen penalties beyond fines in an effort to bolster the “made in Italy” brand.
